page.title: 03COWES REGATTA
page.content: The Cowes Combined Club committee have their headquarters at the{Regatta {Centre,Bath Road.}The C.C.C.organises the{Cowes Week Regatta}held each year in the first week of August.The 8 member clubs each organise one days racing.27 classes & 700 boats race each day, & 13,000 yachtsmen visit Cowes for the Regatta.Two full-time secretaries are employed at the centre but during Cowes Week extra staff process details and provide information.The secretary's work is varied & demanding & requires sailing experience.The Regatta makes a big difference to Cowes.Sail-makers,boat repairers & chandlers rely on the Regatta for business.Extra visitors need accommodation & local people help with this.Recently efforts have been made to improve facilities for sailors & make the town look more attractive.
